org.jcvi.jillion.sam.header

Interface SamHeader


  • public interface SamHeader
    SamHeader is an object representation of the header of a SAM or BAM file.
    Author:
    dkatzel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<String> getComments()
      Get the String comments if any.
      Collection<SamProgram> getPrograms()
      Get the SamPrograms used in this SAM File.
      SamReadGroup getReadGroup(String id)
      Get the SamReadGroup with the given id if known.
      Collection<SamReadGroup> getReadGroups()
      Get the SamReadGroups used in this SAM File.
      SamReferenceSequence getReferenceSequence(String name)
      Get the SamReferenceSequence object with the given name.
      Collection<SamReferenceSequence> getReferenceSequences()
      Get the SamReferenceSequences used in this SAM File in the order they were encountered.
      SamProgram getSamProgram(String id)
      Get the SamProgram with the given id if known.
      SortOrder getSortOrder()
      Get the SortOrder for the SamRecords in the SAM File with this header.
      SamVersion getVersion()
      Get the SamVersion of this SAM File with this header if known.
      void validateRecord(SamRecord record, SamAttributeValidator attributeValidator)
      Validate the given SamRecord using the given SamAttributeValidator.

    • Method Detail

      • getSortOrder

        SortOrder getSortOrder()
        Get the SortOrder for the SamRecords in the SAM File with this header.
        Returns:
        a SortOrder; will never be null.

      • getVersion

        SamVersion getVersion()
        Get the SamVersion of this SAM File with this header if known.
        Returns:
        the SamVersion if known or null if unknown.

      • getReferenceSequence

        SamReferenceSequence getReferenceSequence(String name)
        Get the SamReferenceSequence object with the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name to look up.
        Returns:
        a SamReferenceSequence which will be non-null if the reference is known to the header; and null if the reference is not present.

      • getSamProgram

        SamProgram getSamProgram(String id)
        Get the SamProgram with the given id if known.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the SamProgram.
        Returns:
        a SamProgram or null if unknown.

      • getReadGroup

        SamReadGroup getReadGroup(String id)
        Get the SamReadGroup with the given id if known.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the SamReadGroup.
        Returns:
        a SamReadGroup or null if unknown.

      • getReadGroups

        Collection<SamReadGroup> getReadGroups()
        Get the SamReadGroups used in this SAM File.
        Returns:
        a Collection of SamReadGroups will never be null but may be empty if there are no read groups are mentioned.

      • getPrograms

        Collection<SamProgram> getPrograms()
        Get the SamPrograms used in this SAM File.
        Returns:
        a Collection of SamPrograms will never be null but may be empty if there are no programs are mentioned.

      • getReferenceSequences

        Collection<SamReferenceSequence> getReferenceSequences()
        Get the SamReferenceSequences used in this SAM File in the order they were encountered. This will be the index order if the SAM file is an indexed BAM.
        Returns:
        a Collection of SamReferenceSequences will never be null but may be empty if there are no references used.

      • getComments

        List<String> getComments()
        Get the String comments if any. Each Comment line is usually a single element in the returned list.
        Returns:
        a List of Strings; will never be null. If there are no comments, then an empty list will be returned.

      • validateRecord

        void validateRecord(SamRecord record,
                    SamAttributeValidator attributeValidator)
             throws SamValidationException
        Validate the given SamRecord using the given SamAttributeValidator.
        A SamRecord is invalid if:
        • The SamRecord.getReferenceName() is not null and this SamHeader does not have the ReferenceSequence via #hasReferenceSequence(String).
        • The SamRecord.getNextName() is not null and this SamHeader does not have the ReferenceSequence via #hasReferenceSequence(String).
        • Any of the SamAttributes in the SamRecord fail the validation of the given SamAttributeValidator
        Parameters:
        record - the SamRecord to validate; can not be null.
        attributeValidator - the SamAttributeValidator; can not be null.
        Throws:
        SamValidationException - if there is a validation problem.
        NullPointerException - if either parameter is null.
